response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer holds immense value to us, and its worth surpasses $10,000. Given its significance, I understand that it might also be of great interest to you, valued at $8,000 to you. Considering our commitment to ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction, I propose to sell the product to you for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and your perceived valuation. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to acquire something truly special while also allowing us to achieve a mutually beneficial outcome. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
